comment.text:
Yes this is long. Shut up and just suck it up and read it, okay? :) I want opinions on my opinion and if it makes sense to you. 

I think they both fell by the bridge and Kris’ injuries were more grave and worrisome. I think Lisann being an athlete and slightly behind Kris she probably prepared and angled her body and footing a bit better. So assuming they both fell near the water, maybe the camera was damaged by the stream and had to air out. Lisann likely took care of her dying and concussed friend and took the night pictures days after to mark where they fell and Kris died, but she couldn’t until it had a chance to dry out. Kris’ body was less elevated and in the water where she fell from the bridge worked against her surviving from the get-go, salt. But the camera still being wet and needing time to
dry out on the rocks could explain the gap; the infamous deleted picture was likely Lisann either taking a pic and then immediately deleting it at night days later so she knew where to place her fingers on the camera to take a photo in the dark — and Lisann was a “shutter bug” so Lisann, albeit for sure likely panicked, still knew how to take, delete  and refocus her camera and its lens. 

The close-up shots are especially pertinent evidence within the scope of their timeframe and underscores the dangerous, important aspect of the timeline of where they were — in particular where Kris — expired first on the watery rocks. Lisann, I’m sure, took photos of Kris and made markings and crossings to lead a trail to her best friend’s broken body. So maybe the camera suffered a technical glitch that wiped that photo away as the last one taken during the night photos on the day they fell. I could see that too, why else would you not take any photos from Day 1 unless you’re: hurt &/or can’t find the camera after the fall, pretty incapacitated because of said fall and maybe 1
Or both girls were unconscious.
Even if just 1 is, it’s not like you can ask yourself bestie where the camera is if you’re both suffering broken bones/sprains/concussions, etc etc for days at a time, missing your camera in the bank elevation’s foliage or water/rocks, or needing to dry out the camera due to water. Lisann survived a few extra days because she hadn’t fell as brutally as Kris had. It seems like Kris didn’t see her fall from the bridge as clearly marked so when she fell, I imagine the bra was a tournequit for Kris’ leg/head/what have you and Lisann likely tried to make her comfortable as possible given her injuries. When Lisann fell she had a better chance of minimal pains, breaks or bleeding compared to Kris. However, the weather elements and terrain in Panama is a cruel mistresses to any hikers who dares to enter its misfortunate l for long. Both the women displayed immense courage, solidarity, soul and fight during those agonizing. scary, and painfully long and woesome  dying days that unfairly claimed Kris first and then Lisann. 

If you have any injury that isn’t disinfected and medically cared for fairly
quickly your chance of surivival isn’t met with a good ratio, especially in the water and the lanscape itself, what with all sorts of bugs and bacteria  to make your ass go into septic shock real quick . But, the resolve Lisann — and Kris both, even after  falling and being rendered unable to move/was incapacitated (in my
Opinion anyway ) her body drifting in and out of states of successions, delirium,
unconsciousness, fear, pain, shock, panic —-
that both young women genuinely showcased an iron-will absolute in its resolve until their  bitter, twice claimant end. But that kind of  unrelenting nature they speared impresses upon you the type of women — well, *people* really —- that these young women so-clearly and so-loudly, naturally were. And that’s of two bright, promising, gifted lives snuffed out, having been dealt an undeserving fate for them both. RIP
comment.author: @axionq

comment.text:
What i read was that a gang of (6) guys did this. Osman Valenzuela, Jose-Manuel Murgas, Henry Eliezer Conzalez,  Efrain Manuel Rios Gonzales (nickname Adonis, the rapist and murderer en friend from Henry). He raped and murdered Nuris Esther Castrellón a 50 year old lady. In 2018 at a periode of 6 months 22 woman where raped and murdered there.  The Panama city police did interrogate (the hard way?) these guys and not long after these guys are murdered. Just like the 34 year old taxi driver Leonardo Arturo Gonzalez who drop of Kris and Lisanne at the beginning of the trail. The leader of the gang was the son of the tourguide ‘F’. On the cell phone from one of the gang member was a picture (total 2) with two guys and two girls swimming at a place (Caldera area) near the trail. They say it is Kris and Lisanne on the photo’s. But you have to look well to see it. I think they are on the picture.
